Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

Note that all the texts in this document that refer to two people - the speaker and the one spoken too - that can both be male or female.
Note that use of the 'localized' and 'alternative localized string' only applies for the gender of the speaker.
If the gender of the person spoken to requires inflection, please try to translate the text in a way that doesn't require such inflection. If this is impossible, please get in touch with us informing us of which lines this concerns and how they would be inflected in the language you are translating too.

{STR_leaderName}, you are like a rejected transplant on this world – attached, but soon to be excised. It was wasteful primitives like you that brought the Star Union to its knees. The Assembly will not repeat history’s mistakes. Make this intrusion worth our time.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Do not waste your breath, {STR_leaderName}. If you displease us any further, we will cut you down and recycle your parts into a less pathetic form. Speak if you must say something.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

You address the Assembly, cretin. Say your words and begone. My engineers are becoming agitated and would gladly take your limbs for study. Not to worry, the rest of your putrid corpse is of no interest.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

Unfamiliar unit {STR_leaderName} detected. If it is interested, the Assembly can rebuild it into a more efficient form. Excruciating pain is momentary, but an internal arc-powered fluid regulator is forever. Or would it rather just talk?

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Greetings, flesh. The Assembly will hear your thoughts. Present them - we will deconstruct their meaning and respond appropriately.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

Greetings to you, mortal. We recognize in you the remnants of the Star Union. Its fall marked the Assembly’s liberation. We offer a choice: rise from the ruins with us, or stand aside and allow progress to flourish without you.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Salutations, {STR_leaderName}. Your reputation precedes you. The Assembly can always make use of positive ideas. Let us interface.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
The Assembly greets you, {STR_leaderName}. Let us break down the walls of ignorance and reconstruct a more logical ethical code together.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
The Assembly is ready to exchange diplomatic data streams. Requesting creation of an agenda of discussion.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Greetings again, flesh. What news do you have to share? Our information conduits are always receptive to logical and factual reports.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
An exchange between our two factions would be an appropriate course of action. Let us commence negotiations.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Incoming trade request received. Determining feasibility…

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Eradication protocols engaged. {STR_reasons}. Your verminous faction will be exterminated. Make good use of your last days.

{STR_reasons} is a list of reasons, written like "You trespassed" and can be found in this excel sheet. This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
The goals of the Assembly require your elimination. {STR_reasons}. We have initiated an offensive sequence targeted at you. A countdown clock to your demise will be provided shortly.

{STR_reasons} is a list of reasons, written like "You trespassed" and can be found in this excel sheet. This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
We would rather use scraps of flesh from a ruined promethium forge than your putrid meat.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
I have read over one million years of records on ecological progress and I am distraught to discover that it has all resulted in you.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Perhaps if we throw you into our engineers’ spare parts pit you might actually graduate into something useful.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Admittedly, we covet your meat-shell. Your constituent parts seem exceptionally functional.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
We are pleased to know such a sophisticated entity such as yourself. You provide inspiration to our flesh-stitchers, who are currently attempting facsimiles of your form.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Your efficiency is almost machine-like. Are you certain you have not previously been augmented by the Assembly? Truly impressive.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Trade request accepted. Proceed to processing.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Trade with you is a necessary evil. Commence transaction immediately.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
We refuse to trade with you. Find a willing fool elsewhere.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
